speech1.text: Who had believe there is a man out there that can sit by a woman he does not know and genuinely be interested in who she is, what she does, without his own agenda? He say My name is Alex and I am a consultant. But she would not be interested in that because she would be counting the seconds until he left.

speech2.text: I would not even know what that would look like. So what would a guy like that say? Thinking he was like every other guy.
